abstract.text: An interface to handle sending messages to one or more designated users.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: protocol to resolve, confirm, and handle requests to send text or audio messages to the designated users. Adopt this protocol in an object of your Intents extension that is capable of sending the messages.

object to your handler when the user asks to send a message using your app. The provided intent object contains the recipients and content of the message. Use the methods of this protocol to resolve the parameters and to validate that sending the message is possible.

abstract.text: Empower people to customize interactions for your app on their device.
An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the messages domain.
A file to include in a message.
A request to send a message to the designated recipients.
An interface to handle sending messages to one or more designated users.
Confirms that you can send the message.
Sends the message to the specified recipients.
Resolves the contents of the message.
Resolves the name of the group receiving the message.
Determines what type of message to send.
Resolves the recipients of the message.
Resolves the user’s input when it isn’t clear who the recipients of the message are.
Resolves the name of the group receiving the message.
Your app’s response to a send message intent.
Provide SiriKit with an intent handler capable of handling a specific intent.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
